title: 2012–13 Torino F.C. season
text:
The 2012–13 <a href="Torino%20F.C.">Torino F.C.</a> season was the club's 102nd season of competitive <a href="association%20football">football</a>, 85th season in the top division of Italian football and 68th season in <a href="Serie%20A">Serie A</a>.
Season overview.
Torino were promoted to <a href="Serie%20A">Serie A</a> after three years in the <a href="Serie%20B">lower division</a>, the president <a href="Urbano%20Cairo">Urbano Cairo</a> decided to continue the partnership with the coach <a href="Giampiero%20Ventura">Giampiero Ventura</a> and sporting director <a href="Gianluca%20Petrachi">Gianluca Petrachi</a> for the <a href="2012%E2%80%9313%20Serie%20A">2012–13</a> season, the 96th in the top flight in Torino's history. The return to Serie A also granted the club an income of between <a href="Euro">€</a>30–40 million, including TV rights, placement in the standings and domestic trophies.
